entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
